text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Kitamura was born in Yokkaichi on May 27, 1982. After graduating from high school, he joined newly was promoted to J2 League club, Yokohama FC in 2001. He played many matches as forward and offensive midfielder from first season. Although the club results were bad every season until 2005, Yokohama FC won the champions in 2006 season and was promoted to J1 League. However he left the club end of 2006 season without playing J1. In 2007, he moved to J2 club Montedio Yamagata. He became a regular player as forward soon. Montedio also won the 2nd place in 2008 season and was promoted to J1. Although he played as regular player every season, he could hardly play in the match and Montedio finished at the bottom place in 2011 season. In 2012, Montedio was relegated to J2 and he also could hardly play in the match. In 2013, he moved to his local club Veertien Kuwana in Prefectural Leagues.
